meanings.definition: A chemical compound used as an insecticide.
meanings.sent1: The trichlorfon effectively killed the bugs in the garden.
meanings.sent2: Farmers use trichlorfon to protect their crops from harmful insects.
meanings.sent3: The bugs threw a party in the garden until trichlorfon showed up and crashed it.
meanings.sent4: Trichlorfon acted like a ninja, silently taking out the insect invaders.
meanings.sent5: The smell of trichlorfon lingered in the air, a sign of victory over the pests.

meanings.definition: To treat with trichlorfon to eliminate pests.
meanings.sent1: I will trichlorfon the plants to get rid of the pests.
meanings.sent2: The exterminator will trichlorfon the house to remove the unwanted insects.
meanings.sent3: The pests were so scared of trichlorfon that they packed their bags and left.
meanings.sent4: She trichlorfoned the garden, turning it into a no-fly zone for bugs.
meanings.sent5: After trichlorfoning the area, there wasn't a single pest in sight.
